Interface DriveWrapper

All Known Implementing Classes:

public interface DriveWrapper
Drive Wrapper

    Sets up the control mode for SYSID ONLY!
    default void
    setSpeed(SwerveModuleState desiredState, boolean isOpenLoop)
    gets the velocity of the drive motor in rotations per second either using percentage output ( dutycycleout ) or velocity control triggered by the isOpenLoop parameter
    default void
    stopMotor()
    Stops the motors properly.
